testcase.name: Successful Account Registration
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the registration page...................................passed When I provide the following valid details:.................................passed And I click the "Register" button...........................................passed Then I should see a confirmation message "Your registration completed"......passed

testcase.name: Registration with an Invalid Email
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the registration page...................................passed When I enter "invalid-email" into the Email field...........................passed And I click the "Register" button...........................................passed Then I should see an error message "Wrong email"............................passed

testcase.name: Registration with an Already Registered Email
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the registration page...................................passed When I provide the following details:.......................................passed And I click the "Register" button...........................................passed Then I should see an error message "The specified email already exists".....passed
